verses.roman:
rasāntarāveśe ha-ila viyoga-sphuraṇa
udvega, viṣāda, dainye kare pralapana

synonyms: rasa-antara-āveśe—in the ecstatic love of different mellows; ha-ila—there was; viyoga-sphuraṇa—awakening of separation; udvega—distress; viṣāda—moroseness; dainye—humility; kare pralapana—speaks like a crazy person.
translation: Separation from Kṛṣṇa awoke various mellows of distress, lamentation and humility. Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu spoke like a crazy man.
